ABOUT.BANNER_DESCRIPTION: Meet the Team Behind Our Commitment to Quality and Service
ABOUT.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION_1: Chuantai Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd. was established in XXXX, is a focus on providing design, manufacturing and service automation company.
ABOUT.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION_2: Since its establishment, Chuantai intelligent CNC machining ordering platform has always been committed to providing customers with one-stop customized services, personalized CNC machining solutions, to ensure product quality and delivery speed, to help customers improve production efficiency and reduce costs.
ABOUT.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION_3: After years of accumulation and development, Chuantai Intelligent has become a mature intelligent manufacturing solution provider.
ABOUT.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION_4: Trust is a core value in our company. We endeavour to earn and maintain the trust of our customers through transparency in our operations, punctuality in delivery, and consistency in the quality of our products.
ABOUT.SECTION_1_DESCRIPTION_5: At our company, we take pride in providing our customers with the highest quality products. Our number one priority is to ensure that every part that leaves our facility meets the highest standards of precision and accuracy.
ABOUT.SECTION_2_DESCRIPTION_1: Chuantai intelligent CNC machining ordering platform provides online quotation, customized processing, order management and other services, through digital technology and intelligent process, to provide customers with efficient and convenient personalized customized processing solutions to meet the various needs of customers.
ABOUT.SECTION_2_DESCRIPTION_2: Customers upload drawings and product requirements on the platform, after selecting materials and processing processes, the platform makes quotations according to customer needs, and shows customers the price and processing time. Customized machining according to customer requirements, including milling, turning, drilling and other processing processes.
ABOUT.SECTION_2_DESCRIPTION_3: Chuantai's efficient production capacity enables custom processing and fast delivery in a short time.
ABOUT.SECTION_2_DESCRIPTION_4: Customers can carry out order management on the platform, including order tracking, logistics information query and other functions, so as to facilitate customers to understand the order status. At the same time, you can also contact the platform by email to solve orders and product-related problems.
ABOUT.SECTION_3_SUBTITLE_DESCRIPTION_1: The management team of Chuantai Intelligent is composed of a group of professionals with rich industry experience and technical background. The core members of the company have deep theoretical knowledge and practical experience in CNC machining and other fields. Provide customers with superior products and services through efficient collaboration.
ABOUT.SECTION_5_DESCRIPTION_1: Customer first: to meet customer needs as the core, and constantly improve the quality of products and services.
ABOUT.SECTION_5_DESCRIPTION_2: Innovation leadership: the pursuit of technological innovation and progress, to provide customers with more competitive solutions.
ABOUT.SECTION_5_DESCRIPTION_3: Team cooperation: advocate unity and cooperation, sharing and win-win, to achieve the company's goals.
ABOUT.SECTION_5_DESCRIPTION_4: Responsibility: Have the courage to take responsibility and actively fulfill corporate social responsibility.
ABOUT.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION_1: In the future, Chuantai Intelligent will continue to deepen the field of science and technology, take technological innovation as the driving force, and constantly improve the core competitiveness of enterprises.
ABOUT.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION_2: We are committed to helping customers improve production efficiency and quality through advanced numerical control technology and intelligent manufacturing solutions to achieve sustainable development.
ABOUT.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION_3: To become a well-known technology enterprise at home and abroad, providing better, smarter and more efficient technology solutions for global customers
ABOUT.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION_4: Trust is a core value in our company. We endeavour to earn and maintain the trust of our customers through transparency in our operations, punctuality in delivery, and consistency in the quality of our products.
ABOUT.SECTION_4_DESCRIPTION_5: At our company, we take pride in providing our customers with the highest quality products. Our number one priority is to ensure that every part that leaves our facility meets the highest standards of precision and accuracy.

MILLING.SUMERISE_DESCRIPTION_2: Milling is the machining process of rotating a cutting tool, called a milling cutter, to remove material from a workpiece and create the desired shape and features. It can be used to create a variety of different shapes and features, such as planes, slots, holes, bevels, arcs, and more. By adjusting the path, speed and feed of the cutter, as well as by using different types of cutters, highly precise machining results can be achieved.
MILLING.SUMERISE_DESCRIPTION_3: In CNC milling, it is controlled by computer numerical control (CNC) technology. The CNC system receives pre-programmed instructions that will precisely define parameters such as the motion trajectory, speed and feed of the milling cutter to achieve high-quality milling results.

TURNING.SUMERISE_DESCRIPTION_2: CNC turning is a computer numerical control (CNC) machine tool machining technology that is specially used to machine rotating body parts. In CNC turning, the workpiece is usually fixed to the spindle of the lathe by a fixture and machined by the rotation of the spindle. The tool moves along the axis of the workpiece to remove the material and form the desired shape and size.

DRILLING.SUMERISE_DESCRIPTION_2: Drilling is a machining process that mainly creates a circular hole in a workpiece through a rotating drill bit. In this process, the drill bit is fixed to the spindle of a drilling press or other drilling equipment and rotated at high speed, then gradually advanced downward or diagonally into the workpiece to remove the material and create the desired hole.CNC drilling is a precise drilling operation that utilizes computer numerical control (CNC) technology.
DRILLING.SUMERISE_DESCRIPTION_3: Precise control of drill position, speed, and feed is achieved by pre-programmed commands to control the precise position and movement of the drill bit to ensure that the diameter, depth, and positional accuracy of the hole meet the design requirements. At the same time, it is also necessary to select the appropriate drill type and cutting data to adapt to different workpiece materials and machining requirements.

GUIDE.TITLE: Customers Guide
GUIDE.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to our Customers Guide! This is your go-to resource for learning how to use our platform to get a quotation. Whether you're a new customer or a returning one, we'll walk you through the steps to ensure you have a seamless experience. From creating an account to submitting a request, we'll cover everything you need to know to make the process as easy as possible. Let's get started!
GUIDE.SUBTITLE: How to Get an Instant Quote
GUIDE.SUBDESCRIPTION: You can obtain a quote by following a few simple steps:
GUIDE.STEP_1_DESCRIPTION: By clicking on the button inside the red box, you will be directed to the login page where you can enter your username and password to access your account. This login process is essential for protecting your account information and ensuring that only authorized users are able to access the platform.
GUIDE.STEP_1_NOTE: If you dont have ana account you can Sing up filling the from
GUIDE.STEP_2_DESCRIPTION: To log in, enter your phone number and password on the login page. If you do not have an account yet, you can click on `Register Now` to create a new account. Make sure to enter your phone number and password accurately, and remember your login credentials to successfully access your account.
GUIDE.STEP_2_NOTE: When registering for a new account, you may need to provide some personal information and set a secure password to ensure the security of your account. The login and registration process only takes a few minutes. After which you can enjoy the services and features provided by the platform.
GUIDE.STEP_3_DESCRIPTION: After successfully logging in, please upload the file according to the information provided in the red box. Once you have uploaded the file, confirm the content or make any necessary modifications. Click on `Next` to proceed with editing the file.
GUIDE.STEP_4_DESCRIPTION: After confirming the files you wish to use or obtain a quotation for, you will be redirected to the panel of selected products or files. Click on `Edit` to establish the specific characteristics for each machine part.
GUIDE.STEP_4_DESCRIPTION_2: Once you click on the edit button, you will be directed to a page where you can select the desired process, upload an attachment, and add relevant notes. At the bottom of the photo on the left side, you will be able to view the previous information of the item in question.
GUIDE.STEP_4_NOTE: Once you have selected all the necessary data and attached any additional files, if needed, confirm the changes in order to update the information.
GUIDE.STEP_5_DESCRIPTION: Please click on the edit button to choose the file upload method. Then, fill in the shipping information and select the delivery options in the designated area on the right-hand panel. kindly select your preferred estimated delivery date and provide us with your shipping details.
GUIDE.STEP_5_DESCRIPTION_2: After selecting your estimated delivery time, please proceed by clicking on the `Edit` button to provide your shipping information and choose the delivery options. This can be done conveniently in the designated area located on the right-hand panel. Your attention to these details ensures a seamless delivery process, and then click on the save button.
GUIDE.STEP_6_DESCRIPTION: Afterwards, you will need to confirm the shipping details by clicking on the checkbox  to ensure that this is the address you wish to select.
GUIDE.STEP_6_DESCRIPTION_2: Finally, once you`ve customized all your preferences, simply request your personalized quotation, and within just 24 hours, we`ll swiftly attend to your order with utmost care..
